Oh Portal 2, where do I even begin. I was probably somewhere between 8-10 when I first played this on my friend's old gaming computer and I remember thinking it was the best thing I had ever seen. I remember when I went home I BEGGED my parents to buy me a copy and on my birthday they did. I have played this game one 3 generations of console now, (X-Box, One and, Series X) and the hour count for my steam account, is nowhere near accurate. Easily one of the best video games I've ever played and a revolutionary take on a puzzle game. Thank you Valve for this amazing piece of my childhood.
Incredible puzzle game! One of the funniest games ever made! Once you've beaten story mode there is a great map building community to keep it fresh! 10/10 can't wait for portal 3!!!
its is a great puzzle game experience, will play again defiently!
i played this when i was 5 and coming back and playing it is awesome
Depuis le temps que je voulais le faire, voilÃ  fait ! Un jeu aussi original que bon ! Je recommande fortement. :)
this game still slaps to this day - hope one day we'll get a new puzzle fps from valve like this again.
common your telling me you do not like portal 2 smh smh
Play for the gameplay, stay for the surprisingly rich characters and world-building.
like the first one but better :)
loved the game, had a great plot and would overall definitely recommend.
